summary:
I am an enthusiastic and dedicated Pre-Sales Consultant and Solutions Architect with more than 25 years of experience specialising in pre-sales technical consulting, project management, telecoms solutions architecture and overseeing full development lifecycle of projects in the global telecoms and ICT sectors. I have strong technical abilities; with verifiable success in: sales, business development, vendor management, technical consultancy, 2G/3G/LTE Transmission/Transport Network Planning, network solutions architecture and telecoms network design, Cloud networking, SDN, NFV, Smart cities.  I’m an innovative and practical analyst and problem solver, with a proven ability to translate end user requirements into a technical reality and I am now seeking to secure a role in Pre-Sales consultancy and telecoms solutions to clients.

I am a proactive business development professional, commanding sound business acumen and financial expertise; able to identify opportunities and implement strategies to meet company sales and growth targets. I possess sound senior level management experience, with proven success at consistently exceeding company revenue targets in respect of sales, revenue and customer satisfaction.

I am a pragmatic and innovative leader, with a hands-on approach to achieving results, and proven success at meeting company objectives. I possess sound communication skills and have proven success in formulating and maintaining positive relationships with clients, 3rd parties, colleagues and managers; being able to provide support and guidance in areas of enterprise architecture, technical consulting and ICT/telecoms solutions.

Throughout my career I have shown proven ability in building and managing cross-functional, geographically-dispersed teams, and I am passionate about delivering excellence. In addition, I have a unique ability to manage multiple projects and navigate complex challenges according to client specifications and needs.

school.name: Zuyd Hogeschool | Zuyd University of Applied Sciences

profile_positions.description: Working on several projects development in France and BeNeLux in cooperation with different multi international companies and subcos for the deployment of 5G Network (Radio/MW) and Fibre (FTTH/FTTx) deployment
profile_positions.title: Managing Director

profile_positions.description:
OOREDOO | ORANGE | VIMPELCOM (VEON) ACCOUNTS 

In this role I am accountable for managing and supporting business development and Network strategies across the MEA region (Middle East & Africa) ensuring alignment with business and operational goals.  I manage several key client accounts within the region for Orange, Ooredoo and VimpelCom...
profile_positions.title: TECHNICAL PRESALES MANAGER/ACCOUNT MANAGER/BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT

profile_positions.description: I supported and managed technical issues in respect of network modernization (Transport Network for 4G/LTE) on behalf of the VimpelCom key account based in the Netherlands, Russia, Italy, Canada and CIS regions.  I developed and directed new opportunities in MBB and FBB within the key account, and served as the main point of contact for the client in respect of technical and sales issues.  In addition, I provided technical solutions for the Transport Network (E2E) and assisted clients with defining short and long term strategies based on market needs and customer requirements.  I also played a pivotal role in leading and supporting all tenders on a global scale in line with modernization objectives.
profile_positions.title: PRINCIPAL SOLUTION SALES MANAGER

profile_positions.description:
STC KSA ACCOUNT

I led the Transmission/Transport Network Design with responsibility over a team of 16 Engineers and Consultants as well as subcontractors throughout the Managed Services 4G swap project.  I managed the main technical interface from the STC side to Managed Services Vendors (Ericsson, NSN, Huawei and ALU), and defined backhauling strategy from STC Transport network E2E (GPON, FTTx, IP MW, Dark fibre, IP/MPLS, NG-SDH and WDM).  In addition, I designed and planned E2E routing and protection for single RAN to the edge network and back to the core network, and proposed E2E QOS from access to the core network and defined a standard design structure for the Transport network in alignment with STC design requirement for vendors.  I also reviewed and approved Transmission/Transport designs (HLD and LLD) provided by vendors, and developed and presented workshops with Vendors and provided 3G HSPA+ and LTE training to Engineers across SRAN Architecture, Transport Network, Transmission Network, Network Dimensioning, DCN and Sync.  I provided network dimensioning and overbooking for the IPRAN in access and edge areas.
profile_positions.title: SENIOR TECHNICAL MANAGER

profile_positions.description:
ERICSSON UK ACCOUNT

In this role, I supported Ericsson Managed Services for the MBNL project in the UK as part of the Transmission Design Team.  I managed and coordinated testing of new MW-based Ethernet features including QoS, SyncE, 1588v2, Eth O&M, Adaptive Modulation, Ethernet throughput and Ethernet bandwidth sharing for Ethernet-based microwave and analysed business requirements to develop technical network solutions and their frameworks.  I also designed, tested and inspected data communications systems and performed network modelling, analysis and planning.  I wrote and implemented guidelines and test proposals for new features, and provided support to the deployment department in respect of implementing features and the required tools and processes.
profile_positions.title: SENIOR TECHNICAL LEAD

profile_positions.description:
AVIAT NETWORKS MEA ACCOUNT

In this role, I managed tenders for Mobile Backhaul solutions for the Middle East Region; being primarily accountable for overseeing the Technical Engineering Department of seven Engineers throughout project lifecycle.  I provided technical support in respect of tenders, RFPs, BOQ’s and design/planning issues (E2E) for the Next Generation Network (IP Microwave radio, NGN, ATM, PWE and Ethernet Transport Technologies, and planned, coordinated and delivered technical workshops and product presentations with customers.  I served as the main point of contact for Middle East customers.  I also created internal design configuration documentation including network diagrams and technical definitions and in addition, identified customer needs and recommended/sold technical solutions to ensure achievement of objectives.
profile_positions.title: TECHNICAL PRESALES MANAGER

profile_positions.description:
NOKIA ACCOUNT

I was accountable for managing and coordinating 3G Transmission Design and Planning (access and core), and was instrumental in setting up the first 3G/HSDPA network throughout America and Europe; leading and mentoring Engineers and Consultants in respect of 3G network planning and design.  I also defined proposals for 3G access and core network solutions, set up parameters in line with KPIs and composed guidelines for ATM network planning, and coordinated the planning and configuration of 3G traffic through the SDH backbone (Sites/Cluster/RNC IF).  In addition, I planned datafill for NodeB and RNC and was responsible for the planning and dimensioning of the IuB, lu-CS, lu-PS and lur as well as troubleshooting and resolving technical problems.  I also scheduled and optimised HSDPA and planned DCN for 3G Access Network and developed Transmission templates for the IuB, Iu-CS, Iu-PS and Iur interfaces.
I oversaw also the planning and optimisation of Transmission/Transport Networks for the 3G+/4G network throughout the Western and Southern areas of Europe; serving as the main point of contact for clients in respect of Mobile Backhaul projects.  I liaised with the main client (T-Mobile Austria) in respect of 3G swaps, LTE trials and network modernisation, and planned and optimised all NG-SDH, ATM, IP networks and IP microwave (packet MW) in access and core networks.  I also coordinated and optimised the PRAN network using various technologies including ATM, Ethernet and IP.  In addition, I assisted and supported customers with the introduction of IP technologies for the IP Backhaul Network project.  I also scheduled the DCN network for access and performed NG-SDH planning and optimisation, and supported technical and solution management functions for the NSN Global division.
profile_positions.title: TECHNICAL PRESALES MANAGER

profile_positions.description:
WATANIYA TELECOM (OOREDOO) ACCOUNT

•Successfully built the first ever National SDH Backbone for Wataniya Telecom Algeria.
•Managed the project to connect the traffic to MSCs (BSCs to MSCs, MSCs to MSCs)
•Migrated and integrated of all A-bis, A-ter and MSC Interconnection traffic into the National SDH Backbone.
•Secured a long-term business strategy. Produced a business case evaluation through the study of leasing lines from the other LL providers. 
•Managed and trained a team of the local Engineers.
profile_positions.title: REGIONAL MANAGER

profile_positions.description:
•Pioneered the first rollout of 3G in Rotterdam, The Hague and other big cities.
•Managed the defining and planning phases. Parameters of ATM network on Node B’s and RNC’s, ATM traffic routing from Node B’s to RNC’s over SDH/PDH network. Planned SDH paths (city rings between hub sites). Planned ATM paths and channels; VPI & VCI planning, Bit Rate planning and configuration.
profile_positions.title: SENIOR 3G/UTRAN ENGINEER

profile_positions.description:
•Managed the Planning and Operations team. This team integrated an EDDF implementation and constructed SDH rings. These were the first of their type in The Netherlands.
•Completed the planning and optimisation of an access network (BTS - BSC), using PDH and SDH network.
•Configuration of routing, protection and circuit provisioning was completed for EDDF/SDH.
•Participated in the SOS (Save Our Switches) project within the Vodafone Integration strategy.
profile_positions.title: TRANSMISSION ENGINEER
